title: Rajasthan Royals extends its deal with Luminous
description: Rajasthan Royals has extended its title sponsorship deal with Luminous Power Technologies for another two years, with the brand's logo featured on the jersey. The deal could be worth up to '40 crore, with the IPL 2023 deal worth around '15 crore. The partnership has helped Luminous gain over a 40x return on media exposure during IPL 2023.
